short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filters products based on country of origin!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
⚡ UPDATES ‣ Added for Amazon.com & Amazon.es, Amazon.de, Amazon.co.uk based on demands. Please configure before using else the default given below will apply to these websites too. Cheers ✌️.

‣ Default Configuration:
1. The Plugin is enabled by default.
2. Default Setting: Only products made in the country where you are shown with tags. From other countries, the products get removed.

A‣ Added Option to reset settings to default. This is shown as a link below 'Filter' button in the Plugin UI.

📝 DESCRIPTION
This plugin will allow you to filter products on Amazon listing & search pages based on country of origin. The country information will be added and if desired, the products not matching the category will be removed from the screen.

💪 MOTIVATION: VOCAL FOR LOCAL 🦁.

❗Note: I don't collect or take any data. All the processing happens in the browser.

I request you to contact in my email 📧 csdev1305@gmail.com in case you need any 1-1 assistance in using the plugin. Would be happy to help.

𝒩𝒶𝓂𝒶𝓈𝓉ℯ 🙏
